data.name: QYL001AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Activity/Span missing semantic convention attributes

data.name: QYL001AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Activity '{0}' should have semantic convention attributes for '{1}' operations

data.name: QYL001AnalyzerDescription
data.value: OpenTelemetry Activities (Spans) should include semantic convention attributes appropriate for their operation type. This enables correlation, filtering, and analysis in observability backends.

data.name: QYL002AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Deprecated semantic convention

data.name: QYL002AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Attribute '{0}' is deprecated since schema v{1}. Use '{2}' instead.

data.name: QYL002AnalyzerDescription
data.value: This attribute name has been deprecated in the OpenTelemetry semantic conventions. Using the newer attribute name ensures compatibility with modern observability tools.

data.name: QYL003AnalyzerTitle
data.value: ActivitySource should be registered with AddSource()

data.name: QYL003AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: ActivitySource '{0}' is not registered with AddSource() in the tracing configuration

data.name: QYL003AnalyzerDescription
data.value: ActivitySources must be registered with AddSource() in the OpenTelemetry tracing configuration to be included in the trace pipeline. Unregistered sources will not emit spans.

data.name: QYL004AnalyzerTitle
data.value: GenAI span missing required attributes

data.name: QYL004AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: GenAI Activity '{0}' is missing required attribute '{1}'

data.name: QYL004AnalyzerDescription
data.value: GenAI spans must include required semantic convention attributes (gen_ai.system, gen_ai.request.model, gen_ai.operation.name) to enable proper observability and correlation of LLM operations.

data.name: QYL005AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Use gen_ai.client.token.usage histogram for token metrics

data.name: QYL005AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Token usage should be recorded using 'gen_ai.client.token.usage' histogram instead of '{0}'

data.name: QYL005AnalyzerDescription
data.value: GenAI token usage metrics should use the gen_ai.client.token.usage histogram instrument as defined by the semantic conventions. This ensures compatibility with standard GenAI observability dashboards.

data.name: QYL006AnalyzerTitle
data.value: GenAI operation name should follow semantic conventions

data.name: QYL006AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: GenAI operation name '{0}' should be one of: chat, text_completion, embeddings

data.name: QYL006AnalyzerDescription
data.value: GenAI operation names should follow the semantic conventions: 'chat' for chat completions, 'text_completion' for text completions, and 'embeddings' for embedding generation.

data.name: QYL007AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Meter should be registered with AddMeter()

data.name: QYL007AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Meter '{0}' is not registered with AddMeter() in the metrics configuration

data.name: QYL007AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Meters must be registered with AddMeter() in the OpenTelemetry metrics configuration to be included in the metrics pipeline. Unregistered meters will not export metrics.

data.name: QYL008AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Metric instrument name should follow naming conventions

data.name: QYL008AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Metric name '{0}' should follow the pattern: namespace.component.metric_name.unit

data.name: QYL008AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Metric instrument names should follow OpenTelemetry naming conventions using dot-separated namespaces and snake_case for individual words. Include the unit as a suffix when applicable.

data.name: QYL009AnalyzerTitle
data.value: ServiceDefaults configuration incomplete

data.name: QYL009AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: ServiceDefaults configuration is missing '{0}'. Add {1} for complete observability setup.

data.name: QYL009AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Complete ServiceDefaults configuration should include tracing, metrics, and logging setup. Missing components may result in incomplete observability data.

data.name: QYL010AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Collector endpoint should use OTLP protocol

data.name: QYL010AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Collector endpoint '{0}' should use OTLP protocol (grpc:// or http://...v1/traces)

data.name: QYL010AnalyzerDescription
data.value: qyl collector endpoints should use the OTLP protocol for standardized telemetry export. OTLP provides better performance and broader compatibility than proprietary protocols.

data.name: QYL011AnalyzerTitle
data.value: [Meter] class must be partial static

data.name: QYL011AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Class '{0}' with [Meter] attribute must be declared as 'partial static' for source generator support

data.name: QYL011AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Classes decorated with [Meter] attribute must be declared as 'partial static' to allow the source generator to implement the metric recording methods. The generator creates static fields for Meter and instrument instances.

data.name: QYL012AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Metric method must be partial

data.name: QYL012AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Method '{0}' with [{1}] attribute must be declared as 'partial' for source generator support

data.name: QYL012AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Methods decorated with [Counter] or [Histogram] attributes must be declared as 'partial' to allow the source generator to implement the metric recording logic. The generator creates the method body that records values to the corresponding instrument.

data.name: QYL013AnalyzerTitle
data.value: [Traced] attribute requires non-empty ActivitySourceName

data.name: QYL013AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: [Traced] attribute on '{0}' has empty or null ActivitySourceName - provide a valid source name

data.name: QYL013AnalyzerDescription
data.value: The [Traced] attribute requires a non-empty ActivitySourceName to identify the source of spans. This name should match a registered ActivitySource in your application's tracing configuration.

data.name: QYL014AnalyzerTitle
data.value: Deprecated GenAI semantic convention

data.name: QYL014AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: GenAI attribute '{0}' is deprecated. Use '{1}' instead.

data.name: QYL014AnalyzerDescription
data.value: Some GenAI semantic convention attributes have been renamed or deprecated. Using the current attribute names ensures compatibility with modern observability tools and dashboards that expect the latest conventions.

data.name: QYL015AnalyzerTitle
data.value: High-cardinality tag on metric

data.name: QYL015AnalyzerMessageFormat
data.value: Tag '{0}' on metric is high-cardinality and may cause memory issues in metrics backends

data.name: QYL015AnalyzerDescription
data.value: High-cardinality tags like user.id, request.id, or session.id create a unique time series for each distinct value. This can overwhelm metrics backends with memory and storage costs. Consider using these values as span attributes instead, or aggregate them into buckets.
